short_summary: Electronic Assembly and Installation Kit Spare parts for Militray Equipment
description: This requirement is for Assembly Kit Electronic Assemblies (AKEE), Installation Kit Electronic Assemblies (IKEE) spare parts for the Montreal Depot.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Contract Reference:** cb-814-96567183

**Solicitation Title:** Request for Proposal for Assembly Kit Electronic Assemblies (AKEE) and Installation Kit Electronic Assemblies (IKEE) Spare Parts

**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249162/A

**Publication Date:** May 13, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Contracting Authority:** Department of National Defence

**Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contracting Entity Contact:** Joëlle Henri-Larocque, joelle.henri-larocque@forces.gc.ca, (819) 664-8653

**Procurement Description:**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the procurement of assembly kit electronic assemblies (AKEE) and installation kit electronic assemblies (IKEE) spare parts for the Montreal Depot. The Department of National Defence requires a contract to procure and supply spare parts for maintenance and repair of electronic assemblies.

**Goods and Services:**

The scope of work includes the procurement of spare parts for AKEE and IKEE kits, including but not limited to:

* Electrical cable and accessories
* Panels or panelling
* Mounting hardware
